name: Pixelfox
description:
A 2d SHMUP that we made back in 2014 for a game jam. It was a lot of fun and I have been working on-and-off to make a sequel happen.

Works with a 360 controller (maybe xbone controller too, I dont own one so I have not tried with it!)

Controls:

360 CONTROLER:

STICK - MOVE
A - SHOOT
START - PAUSE
BACK (When Paused) - QUIT

KEYBOARD:

MOVE - WASD
SHOOT - Numpad3 / RIGHT SHIFT / SPACE
PAUSE - Esc
QUIT - Q (While Paused)

Protip: Dodging enemy shots while you're not shooting for about four seconds causes you to slowly recover life.

There's also a playthrough I did of the hard mode here:

There's also a bonus joke difficulty selected by holding right on the difficulty toggle from the main screen for about ten seconds.

The original upload site can be found here: http://gamejolt.com/games/pixelfox/26698
